doc.field: Record Group 7. Parent and Teacher Association (1916-2001; 3.25 linear feet)
Record Group 7. Parent and Teacher Association (1916-2001; 3.25 linear feet)

This record group contains materials of the Parent and Teacher Association (PTA) of the Ethical Culture Fieldston Schools. Topics covered include the administration of the PTA organization, PTA-sponsored events, publications produced by the PTA, and the relationship between parents and the school. Correspondence, meeting materials, and ephemera make up the bulk of the record group.
